description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Give your avatar the ride of its life with this rag-doll physics based game. Play alone or with up to 3 other friends. See your avatar fall, explode, rebounce or climb up to the victory.
